function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:43:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Life Sutra aims to reach our diverse consumers, who may not have the time to access practical ways to implement growth-promoting psychoeducational resources, through our thoughtful and fun relationship-enhancing and educational games and tools.

Life Sutra Card Games

How did we get our start?

We launched Life Sutra to equip individuals, couples & families with practical psychoeducational games to empower their relationships and lives.

What makes our products unique?

Our easy-to-play card or board games distill what matters most in our relationships and lives from my extensive training in psychology. Every game play enriches you and your loved ones with life skills for success and happiness.

Why do we love what we do?

I love accelerating growth creatively. It naturally brings me great joy to do this through our games for our Life Sutra consumers too!

Dr. Tania Sharma, Ph.D., CRC

CEO – Life Sutra

Mission: To provide practical psychoeducation to individuals, couples and families to live better, engaged, meaningful, fun and connected lives.

Vision: To develop games and tools to enhance individual, couple and family relationships and Life skills.

Values: Access to practical psychoeducation for all; fostering receptive and connected relationships

Life Sutra Games

Best Gift for any Occasion

BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR NEWLYWEDS – a fun way of entering married life, creating romantic and joyous memories through deep conversations and thoughtful activities
GET DEEP AND AFFECTIONATE – helps you discover new things about your partner through conversations on different topics across different life areas.
BACKED BY SCIENCE – Designed based on scientific and psychological techniques used in marriage counseling, with CBT, EMDR, and mindfulness
PREMIUM ANNIVERSARY GIFT – best quality, and elegant looking gift for your partner, with the use of FSC certified paper for sustainability in packaging. Our cards are printed with love and promote environment friendly products
BUSINESS WITH A HEART – Combine GREAT FUN along with heartwarming activities. Part of our profits from each game purchased is donated to Feeding America
FOR ANY OCCASION – couples toys – husband gift – marriage card game – married games – connect card – couple love – conversation cards couples – couple conversation starters – spouse games – couple question game – anniversary gift husband – best couples game – conversation cards – couples question cards – communication game – couples things – partner games – newlywed games – couple card games – couple activities – newlywed game – romantic couple


Read more





Talk, Connect & Share

Couple Connect game will help you generate thought provoking conversations that will strengthen and deepen your relationship.

Do, Act & Experiment

This card will also help you try behavioral techniques that will increase mindfulness, awareness and acceptance in your relationship

Game that Creates Special Moments

Deepen your bond holistically across 13 important life areas. It's a great tool for learning about each other, staying on the same page, and sharing ideas and feelings.

Read more


Couple Connect is a card game for couples with easy-to-follow instructions. The strategic game helps to deepen your connection, talk about things that are difficult to talk about, and reconnect in the best way possible.

Build trust, intimacy and reignite your romance. Couple Connect is a great tool for improving communication in your relationship.


A New Way to Connect

Write a new story about how you two communicate today

Build a deeper, emotional bond with your partner by asking meaningful questions & doing fun activities great for your relationship.


Spice it up - Rekindle the Romantic Spark

Try a variety of novel psychological techniques and feel your romantic moments more intensely.

Learn to re-program your mind and body to classify positive romantic moments as "sparks."


Feel Loved & Cherished

Couple Connect will help you discover how you both feel loved, cared for, and nurtured by each other.

When you play our game, you create a dedicated space in your day to deepen your bond, pay positive attention, and make each other feel special.


Enjoy Deeper Access to Your Partner

Every card you play gives you a doorway into your partner's thoughts and feelings.

Couple Connect can help you communicate with your partner in novel ways that you may not have tried before.


WHY


EVERYONE


LOVES


THIS GAME


Couple Connect Couple Reconnect Dating Connect Social Genius Bulls & Bears Board Game
Discover Life Sutra Games For couples who have been together less than 10 years and want to strengthen their bond For Couples who have been together for 10+ years and want to rekindle Romantic Spark Game for singles who want to master the Art of Dating Family Game to master Social Skills and boost confidence Family Game to Master Personal Finance & Investments

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

item.title: JEXCULL Dog Doorbell for Training, Adjustable Puppy Doorbells Premium Doggy Train Tools Pet Supplies with 7 Loud Doorbells & 3 Snaps for Small, Medium, Large Dogs Go Outside, Black
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Premium & Sturdy Material】Made of high-quality nylon strap and extra loud tinkle bell, this premium dog ring bell for going outside is durable, sturdy, bite-resistant, and non-toxic. All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:51 UTC – Details)



【Premium & Sturdy Material】Made of high-quality nylon strap and extra loud tinkle bell, this premium dog ring bell for going outside is durable, sturdy, bite-resistant, and non-toxic. All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. A must-have for daily training and playing.
【Adjustable Length & 7 Doorbells】Unlike other puppies supplies on the market, this durable go outside dog bell has a 3-snap design so that the length can be adjusted easily according to your training needs. The 7 bells can make a loud sound to let you notice the dog’s needs and solve them in time.
【Wide Application】With top-quality material, superior craftsmanship, and humane design, these pet training bells are suitable for small, medium, large dogs, or even cats! It is also a great gift idea for your friends or family who love pets and want to train them well.
【What Can You Get】The package comes with 1 x Doggy Train Doorbells. We are so sure that you will fall in love with these puppy accessories and provide a 30-day money-back warranty and 24-house online customer service for all people. What are you waiting for? It’s Time to Do Some Training!

4.5

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
  • WHAT’S INCLUDED:
  • (1) x Steel Tool Organizer
  • Assembly Hardware
  • Wall Mounting Hardware
  • Assembly Instructions

Price: $59.99 - $37.36
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:54 UTC – Details)


FH Group got you covered! Our premium cloth car seat covers not only provide the best protection for your car’s upholstery against any type of mess but they also enhance the looks of your car’s interior. No need to worry anymore about spills, stains, mud, or anything damaging your original car seats because this car seat protector got your back. Every car seat cover we make is built with high-quality, durable materials that will protect your car’s upholstery at all times. We offer automotive seat covers in numerous fabrics, colors, and designs, so you can easily find the seat cover for cars that fits your style the most. We have car seat covers for women, for men and for everyone. Our auto seat covers are compatible with most sedans, SUVs, and vans’ front seats thanks to the universal low back seat cover design that delivers the snug fit you’re looking for, only if the front seats’ headrest is removable. Also, because safety is one of our main goals, this front set of cover for car seats is airbag compatible (officially tested!). We understand messes happen, that’s why these waterproof seat covers for cars are convenient for any type of driver. FH Group car seat covers are a great car interior accessory for your vehicle. We have it all: car seat covers for SUV, car seat covers for autos, car seat covers for vans, you name it!
[UNIVERSAL FIT] Our semi-customized car seat cover fits most vehicles better than other universal covers in the market. Our design has hook-and-loop attachments for a snug fit, straps in the bottom seat, and more, for an almost-customized look
[HIGH-QUALITY AND DURABLE MATERIALS] Our premium cloth car seat covers full set is built with 3 layers of cloth, 3mm padding and mesh fabric, making our covers a reliable and durable car seat protector.
[WASHABLE CAR SEAT COVERS] These carseat covers are machine washable! Simply remove the car seat cover, machine wash, and air dry.
[AIRBAG COMPATIBLE] Our front seat car seat covers feature a special stitching on the side allowing airbag deployment. It’s officially tested, making our covers a reliable car seat protector.
[FRONT SEAT STORAGE POCKET] The front bucket seat covers feature a handy map pocket on the back of the seat so you can store everything you need and have easy access to it.
[CUSTOMIZABLE REAR COVER] This cover is compatible with any split bench and becomes 2 individual covers with the extra mesh piece. This cover features zippers providing full access to the middle armrest. Elongate cover by adding an extra piece.
[AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS] FH Group’s car seats come in 10 different colors, so you can perfectly match your car’s style and aesthetic.

Premium Seat Covers, Auto Accessories and More!

At FH Group we offer a wide variety of automotive products designed to make your life easier and more enjoyable.

Read more

Travel Master Series Seat Covers

Package Includes:

2 Front low back bucket covers.

1 Rear backrest cover.

1 Rear bottom bench cover.

5 Separate headrest covers.

1 Bag of snaps.

Combo packs will include additional products.

Works with Split Bench

Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches

Travel Master Seat Covers

Available in several different colors. Fabric disperses heat to keep you cool and comfortable.

Premium Polyester Fabric

An eye-catching pattern adorns the center panel of this cover, adding a graceful touch to our high quality fabric.

Read more

Compatibility and Installation

Compatibility and Buying Tips

Due to installation requirement, please ensure your headrests can be detached before buying this set.This set is compatible with front side airbags and rear split function.

Dimensions

Semi-Universal to fit a wide range of cars, trucks, and SUVs.

Installation

Installation is simple with our easy instruction videos available on our website. This product is only compatible with vehicles that have detachable or adjustable headrests.

Product Features:

  • Airbag compatible – special stitching on the side allows airbag deployment. Officially tested!
  • Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches
  • Semi-customized to fit most vehicles. Will not interfere with heated seats.

Read more



Unique Flat Cloth Seat Covers Complete Set For Most Sedans, SUVs, and Trucks
Highback Style Neoprene Full Set Airbag Safe
Raised Edge Multi-Use Cargo Tray For Home and Auto
FH Group Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover
Style: Flat Cloth Pattern. Neoprene Highback. Cargo Tray. Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover.
Feature: Our high quality fabric with 3mm of breathable foam backing is soft to the touch and disperses heat, keeping you comfortable and cool on even the hottest summer days. These neoprene seat covers are waterproof, stain proof, and life proof to protect you from all kinds of disasters. Waterproof Neoprene with Non-Slip Backing. Rear seat cover designed to accommodate 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, and 40/20/40 split benches. Our premium all-weather cargo tray will deliver the ultimate protection for your trunk. Heavy duty rubber material protects your trunk against spills and messy cargo and a specially finished surface keeps your haul from shifting around. Is your steering wheel starting to fade and wear, direct sunlight and hot temperatures can damage car interiors. The FH Group Steering Wheel Cover is designed to protect your steering wheel, while adding a touch of class to your ride.
Package Included: 2 front low back bucket covers 1 rear backrest cover 1 rear bottom bench cover 4 separate headrest covers 1 bag of snaps. 2 bucket seat covers, 1 rear bench backrest cover, 1 rear bench bottom seat cover, 3 headrest covers. 1 Raised Edge Cargo Tray for Home and Auto. 1 Steering Wheel Cover.
Dimension: Semi-Universal. Semi-Universal. Available in 32″ and 40″ Sizes. Stretchable Silicone fits all vehicles from small sedans to Trucks and SUVs.
Cleaning Tips: Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Vaccuum or use soap and water. Air dry. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth.
Installation Tips: Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Simply place wherever needed! No installation Required. Easily slides over steering wheel.

About Us

FH Group International, Inc. is a manufacturer you can depend on and trust. Our mission is to exceed your expectations by providing a large selection of outstanding car accessories at affordable prices. We are constantly striving to provide our customers with the most efficient and friendly communications, smooth transactions, and speedy deliveries.

At FH Group International, Inc., we offer a variety of car accessories such as high quality seat covers and car covers for most makes and models on the market, protective floor mats, genuine leather steering wheel covers, and much, much more.

From the brand

File Set

This set include 16 pieces files made by T12 Drop Forged Alloy Steel.A great file set for you to do woodworking

DIY Tool Set

Measuring Tool

Triple Protection Knee Pads

REXBETI quality knee pads with thick gel, high density foam cushion and heavy duty shield give you triple protection

Flooring Tools

Blades & Scraper

Tool Bag

This 16 inch tool bag is constructed with a durable fabric and include 169 pieces household essential tool.

Tool Set

quality tools – Equipped with household essential tool sets that are made out of high-quality steel and are finished in chrome to ensure durability strength, Perfect for home repair and DIY projects
Large tool bag – 16 inch tool bag is designed for carrying small to medium-sized hand tools and other small accessories. It is constructed with a durable fabric so it can withstand the load of your tools. The bag features a wide opening design for you to easily store, organize and take out your tools
More space – 11 interior pockets and 8 exterior pockets will provide you enough storage space for tool organizing. The large open space provides you instant access to your tools as well as visibility to the tool you want to use. The tool bag is easy and comfortable to travel with as it has a padded shoulder strap and a comfortable handle that has a fine grip
Perfect gift choice – With REXBETI tool kit, you will enjoy a complete variety of tools which you can use for any of your DIY projects
About REXBETI – REXBETI tool bag, a great tool set for men to do home work

A quality tool bag is essential for staying organized and efficient whether you are doing basic DIY work or working household projects. REXBETI tool bag is designed for carrying small to medium-sized hand tools and other small accessories. It is constructed with a durable fabric so it can withstand the load of your tools. The bag features a wide opening design for you to easily store, organize and take out your tools. On the bottom of the bag, there’s 5 base pads to maintains its sturdiness and to protect bottom from wet and dirty conditions. Even when accidental and hard drops occur, the rubbery foam bottom will protects your tools and will remain in their places. The bag also features an internal metal frame that maintains the structure of the bag so you can put and get your tools in and from the bag without losting its shape.

Beside the bag, this REXBETI tool bag is equipped with 219 pieces home repair tools. Most of the tools are made out of high-quality steel and are finished in chrome to ensure durability strength and for the tools to have an anti-corrosion protection.

This set includes:

1pc tool bag / 1pc 8oz claw hammer / 1pc magnetic level / 1pc 16ft tape measure / 1pc utility knife with 10pc blades

2pc Spring clamps / 8pc SAE hex key set: 1/16-5/64-3/32-1/8-3/16-7/32-1/4″ / 8pc Metric hex key set: 1.5-2-2.5-3-4-5-5.5-6mm / 1pc mini saw

1pc water pump plier / 1pc adjustable wrench / 1pc long nose plier / 1pc diagonal plier / 20pc Cr-V bits / 1pc holder / 4pc precision screwdriver

1pc voltage tester / 3pc Cr-V wrench / 30pc 150mm black cable ties / 120pc hardware / 1pc 5 meter electrical tape / 1pc LED flashlight

Large tool bag

The first thing you will notice in this bag is the number of compartments it has. Except the 11 interior pockets, there’re also 8 exterior pockets where you can store often used small tools and accessories so you can instantly reach them

Read more

High quality tool set

Padded strp & handle

The adjustable strap to provide you an easy and quick access to your tools and also a big helper if you have to move around with your tools.

Wide opening mouth

Large-compartment providing ample space for a wide vatiety of tools, parts and accessories. The large open space provides you instant access to your tools as well as visibility to the tool you want to use

Base pads design

5 base pads to maintains its sturdiness and to protect bottom from wet and dirty conditions

Read more

Claw hammer & Pliers & Wrench

8oz claw hammer

6″ Long nose plier

10″ water pump plier

6″ diagonal plier

– Drop forged carbon steel

– Heat treated and fully polished for corrosion and rust resistance

– Anti-slip soft rubbery handle

Home repair tool set

9″ magnetic level

16ft tape measure

20pc screwdriver bits and holder

16pcs Inch/Metric allen wrench set

4pc presicion screwdriver

2pc spring clamps

Home repair tool set

5 meter electrical tape

1pc digital voltage tester

1pc 18mm utility knife

10pc steel blade

1pc LED flashlight

Home repair tool set

About Luciphia

Pets are our best friends, and we do our best to provide them with the best care and attention.

Luciphia was founded with a clear purpose – for your best pet friends.

Luciphia finds a variety of fabrics and designs them carefully to provide your pet friends with blankets and beds in a variety of styles and functions. Create a warm and cozy home for your pet friends with warm and soft blankets and beds to enjoy your pet time!

MATERIAL: 100% microfiber and soft sherpa fleece(polyester). The blankets are made of ultra-soft extravagant fabric.
EASY TO WASH/CLEAN: 100% machine washable. The blankets not only look elegant, it is also easy to clean and dry. It can be utilized as a cover or quilt for dogs, cats and other pets.
USAGE: Protect furniture from scratching and pet hair. Cute and lovely paw print design. No pilling, skin-friendly, perfect for the couch, sofa, bed and pet carrier.
EASY TO CARRY: The blankets are soft and lightweight. It’s perfect to take it to participate in outdoor activities, such as traveling, camping, and picnic. Keep your pets warm and cozy during sleeping in the outdoors.
